input.sentences: seeing the small town made me grateful .
the market was open so i was able to get food .
they had a little of everything .
i ate as i viewed the sights of the lakes .
output.sentences: We were grateful to have a day off to explore the town we had just moved to.
First we went to the market and bought some local homegrown food.
We even got to watch as they cut off the pieces of meat we selected.
There were so many sights and we viewed many lakes that day.
Today we toured the hillside of our new town so on our next day off we will view tour the valley.
